mapper.select: select a.ano,a.a_m_id, a.a_g_gno, a.a_g_actionstatus, a.a_g_enddate,f.f_name,g.gname from myaction a join goods g on a.a_g_gno = g.gno join goodsfile f on a.a_g_gno = f.f_g_gno where a.a_m_id = #{a_m_id} and a.a_g_actionstatus!=2 order by a.ano desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select a.ano, a.a_m_id, a.a_g_gno, a.a_g_actionstatus, a.a_g_enddate,f.f_name,g.gname,a.paystatus,a.deliverystatus from myaction a join goods g on a.a_g_gno = g.gno join goodsfile f on a.a_g_gno = f.f_g_gno where a.a_m_id = #{a_m_id} and a.a_g_actionstatus=2 limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
select count(a_g_actionstatus) from myaction where a_g_actionstatus != 2
select count(a_g_actionstatus) from myaction where a_g_actionstatus = 2
